title: E-Gradebook St Sofia
description: Mobile-friendly gradebook experience for St. Sofia that layers a responsive UI on top of an existing ASP.NET Web Forms backend.
shortDescription: Mobile gradebook and parent portal for St. Sofia.
challenge: Deliver a mobile-first experience on a legacy ASPX/C# gradebook.
solution: Reskinned the existing ASP.NET Web Forms app with responsive layouts, simplified navigation, and tighter asset loading while keeping data and auth flows intact.
results: Parents and teachers can review grades comfortably on phones
No backend rewrite required, reducing risk
Faster perceived load via trimmed assets
features: Role-aware views for parents and teachers
Lightweight front-end optimizations on legacy stack
Secure authentication preserved for the school portal

title: Task Bank St Sofia
description: A modern web platform for teachers to create, manage, and share printable and downloadable worksheets, powered by a flexible task bank and worksheet builder — with OCR ingestion of existing worksheets and AI-assisted generation of similar tasks from examples.
shortDescription: Worksheet builder and task bank for St. Sofia teachers.
challenge: Enable teachers to easily craft custom worksheets from a large task bank, ingest existing materials via OCR, and generate similar tasks with AI — all with printable/downloadable formats.
solution: Developed a web app with a worksheet builder, task search, OCR import for PDF/images, and AI-assisted task suggestions; backed by a scalable Java/Spring Boot API and real-time updates.
results: Teachers can generate worksheets in minutes
Scan existing worksheets via OCR and convert to tasks
AI suggestions speed up creating similar exercises
Worksheets are printable and downloadable as PDFs
Task bank grows with teacher contributions
features: AI generation of similar tasks from examples

title: QSign
description: Desktop e-signature application built with Python and Tkinter for secure document signing with customizable digital signatures, logo support, size and positioning controls, and real-time signature validation.
shortDescription: Desktop app for creating and validating custom digital signatures.
challenge: Create a desktop tool that lets users design custom signatures with logos and positioning, apply them to PDFs, and validate signatures created by others with full audit trails.
solution: Built a Python/Tkinter desktop app with intuitive signature design tools, PDF rendering for signature placement preview, validation logic to confirm signature authenticity, and local document management for privacy.
results: Users can create professional signatures and apply them to documents instantly
Signature validation confirms authenticity and creation timestamps
Lightweight desktop app with no cloud dependency
Works offline for document processing
features: Drag-and-drop signature creation with logo uploads
Adjustable signature size, rotation, and transparency
PDF import and signature placement preview
Local audit logs for all signing activity
Batch signature application to multiple documents

title: Venus Labyrinth Oracle Board
description: Custom interactive control system for Venus Labyrinth's immersive sensory theatre experience. The Oracle Board connects to three symbolic object tables and operates stage lighting as a compass to guide audience members through 28 rooms exploring brain functions and memory.
shortDescription: Interactive light control system for immersive sensory theatre.
challenge: Inherit and improve a custom Oracle Board control system that coordinates stage lighting across three symbolic object tables to guide audiences through an immersive, human-specific performance.
solution: Refined and optimized the existing Oracle Board system, enhancing its responsiveness and reliability for real-time audience guidance through lighting cues that act as a compass for room selection.
results: Successfully supported second unique performance (December 6-7, 2025)
Improved system reliability and responsiveness
Seamless integration with 28-room experience
Enhanced audience navigation through lighting guidance
features: Brain function and memory exploration support

title: Chestitka.bg
description: WordPress-powered greeting cards and gifts storefront with a custom theme, WooCommerce flows, and performance tuning for fast checkout in Bulgarian.
shortDescription: Greeting cards and gifts store built on WordPress/WooCommerce.
challenge: Launch a localized e-commerce experience quickly on WordPress while keeping checkout fast on shared hosting and minimizing plugin bloat.
solution: Built a lean WordPress theme with WooCommerce, trimmed plugins, optimized media, and added caching/CDN rules to keep pages light and checkout reliable.
results: Launched production store in under six weeks
Sub-2s first-page load on mobile for key flows
Streamlined product and checkout steps for higher completion
Editorial team can add products and promos without developer help
features: Custom WordPress theme for brand fit
WooCommerce product, cart, and checkout flows
Caching + CDN tuning for faster loads

title: QuackStack Website
description: The QuackStack marketing site and portfolio — built for speed, clarity, and a premium feel.
shortDescription: Our own site: fast, responsive, and designed to convert.
challenge: Create a modern studio site that loads fast, looks premium, and scales with projects + content without adding CMS complexity.
solution: Built a Next.js App Router site with a component-driven design system, MDX-powered blog, and performance-focused effects that gracefully reduce on mobile.
results: Fast initial load and smooth navigation
Responsive layout across devices
MDX blog for publishing updates
Clear project pages for case studies
